Summary: bright circular light moving slowly over top of the trees and when we ran outside it was gone
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my girlfriend were sitting in our living room watching a movie and she looked past me and said what is that. I turned and seen the bright light, we then both ran outside and it was gone. We heard no noises or anything. It was moving slow when we saw it.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in bensalem
There were no other sightings in bensalem on or around October 20th 2011
